gHacks 技术新闻 https://www.ghacks.net独立科技新闻博客2023 年 6 月 26 日星期一 10:49:01 +0000 en-US每小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=5.8.7 什么是 iOS 17 敏感内容警告以及如何启用它？ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/what-is-ios-17-sensitive-content-warning-and-how-to-enable-it/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/what-is-ios-17-sensitive-content-warning-and-how-to-enable-it/#respondEmre Çitak Mon, 26 Jun 2023 12:30:49 +0000 iOSMobile Computing https://www.ghacks.net/?p=197841

iOS 17 是 Apple 操作系统的最新版本，带来了许多令人兴奋的功能，并强化了其对用户安全的承诺。一项值得注意的新增内容是 iOS 17 敏感内容警告 [...]

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。帖子什么是 iOS 17 敏感内容警告以及如何启用它？首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

iOS 17是 Apple 操作系统的最新版本，带来了许多令人兴奋的功能，并强化了其对用户安全的承诺。

一项值得注意的新增功能是 iOS 17 敏感内容警告功能，旨在增强 iPhone 安全性并为用户提供对其观看体验的更好控制。

什么是 iOS 17 敏感内容警告功能？

敏感内容警告是 iOS 17 中引入的一项新功能，旨在通过显示警告并屏蔽设备上的敏感内容来保护用户隐私。

这个强大的工具可以保护 FaceTime 通话、短信和通过 AirDrop 共享的内容期间收到的敏感信息。

敏感内容警告功能是一道宝贵的防线。它可以作为各种形式的敏感内容的屏障，包括露骨的照片和视频、暴力、虐待动物和人类、性骚扰和其他攻击性材料。

通过将数据本地存储在设备上，iOS 17 敏感内容警告功能可以帮助您消除对潜在数据泄露的担忧，并增强 iPhone 的整体安全性。

如何启用 iOS 17 敏感内容警告功能

为了确保更安全、更可控的数字体验，iOS 17 允许您为支持该功能的精选应用程序启用敏感内容警告功能。

目前，此功能适用于 AirDrop、消息、FaceTime 和联系人海报。

以下是如何在 iPhone 上启用 iOS 17 敏感内容警告功能：

  1. 打开 iPhone 上的“设置”应用
  2. 向下滚动并点击隐私和安全
  3. 找到并选择敏感内容警告
  4. 在接下来的屏幕上，您将找到一个切换开关。确保它已打开

激活后，导航至“应用程序和访问”部分，您将在其中找到 AirDrop、消息和视频消息的单独切换开关。启用这些开关中的每一个。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。帖子什么是 iOS 17 敏感内容警告以及如何启用它？首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/what-is-ios-17-sensitive-content-warning-and-how-to-enable-it/feed/ 0 如何在 iOS 17 上创建新的 Safari 配置文件https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-create-new-safari-profiles-ios17/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-create-new-safari-profiles-ios17/#respondEmre Çitak Mon, 26 Jun 2023 11:30:15 +0000 iOSTutorials https://www.ghacks.net/?p=197574

Apple 的 iOS 17 为 Safari 带来了一项令人兴奋的新功能——Safari 配置文件，允许用户根据自己的工作流程、兴趣和偏好创建自定义配置文件。具有单独的历史记录、扩展、cookie、选项卡组，[...]

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 如何在 iOS 17 上创建新的 Safari 配置文件一文首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

Apple 的 iOS 17 为 Safari 带来了一项令人兴奋的新功能——Safari 配置文件，允许用户根据自己的工作流程、兴趣和偏好创建自定义配置文件。

Safari 配置文件具有单独的历史记录、扩展、cookie、选项卡组和收藏夹，可提供独特且个性化的浏览体验。但首先，您需要了解如何在 Safari 中创建并启用新的配置文件。

为什么需要新的 Safari 配置文件？

Safari 配置文件使用户能够通过创建适合其特定需求的独特配置文件来个性化其浏览体验。

与跨会话共享浏览数据的选项卡组不同，Safari 配置文件将历史记录、cookie、扩展程序和收藏夹分开，从而确保更加集中和专业的浏览环境。

例如，可以创建工作配置文件，其中包含与专业任务相关的登录服务和网站，以及专门用于与工作相关的活动的特定扩展。

同时，单独的主页配置文件可以专用于个人浏览，并配有定制的选项卡组和供个人使用的登录服务。这种隔离有助于保持注意力并在不同的浏览会话之间轻松切换。

Safari 配置文件的多功能性超出了工作和个人使用的范围。用户可以利用此功能创建适合各种主题、工作流程、位置或特定兴趣的配置文件。

通过这样做，他们可以简化浏览体验，并根据他们正在使用的配置文件快速访问相关信息。

如何在 iOS 17 上创建新的 Safari 配置文件

要在 iOS 17 上充分利用 Safari 配置文件，请按照以下简单步骤操作：

  1. 打开“设置”应用并导航至 Safari
  2. 向下滚动并点击“个人资料”下的“新个人资料”
  3. 在“名称和图标”部分中输入新配置文件所需的名称
  4. 选择一个图标来代表个人资料
  5. 选择与配置文件相对应的颜色
  6. 通过分配文件夹或创建新文件夹来为配置文件设置收藏夹
  7. 定义使用此配置文件时应在何处打开新选项卡
  8. 点击“完成”即可完成新配置文件的创建

现在您已经创建了新的 Safari 配置文件，让我们看看如何切换到另一个配置文件。

  1. 打开 Safari 并点击右下角的选项卡图标
  2. 点击屏幕底部的菜单图标
  3. 选择“配置文件”并选择要使用的所需配置文件

所选配置文件将在新标签页上以彩色背景表示，与指定的颜色相匹配。

现在，您可以在当前配置文件中自由浏览、添加扩展、创建选项卡组以及将选项卡标记为收藏夹，因为这些设置对于每个配置文件都是唯一的。

借助 Safari 配置文件，iOS 17 用户可以解锁高度个性化的浏览体验，适应他们的工作流程和兴趣。利用此功能可以提高工作效率并充分利用Safari 的功能。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 如何在 iOS 17 上创建新的 Safari 配置文件一文首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-create-new-safari-profiles-ios17/feed/ 0 Microsoft Teams 发现漏洞可绕过文件发送限制https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/microsoft-teams-vulnerability-discovered-to-bypass-file-sending-restrictions/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/microsoft-teams-vulnerability-discovered-to-bypass-file-sending-restrictions/#commentsMartin Brinkmann Mon, 26 Jun 2023 10:49:01 +0000Security https://www.ghacks.net/?p=198062

Microsoft Teams 中新发现的漏洞允许攻击者将恶意软件推送到其他 Microsoft Teams 用户的设备上，即使这些用户被视为外部用户。 Jumpsec 的 IT 安全研究人员 [...]

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 发现 Microsoft Teams 漏洞可绕过文件发送限制的帖子首先出现在gHacks Technology News上。

;

Microsoft Teams 中新发现的漏洞允许攻击者将恶意软件推送到其他 Microsoft Teams 用户的设备上，即使这些用户被视为外部用户。

Jumpsec 的 IT 安全研究人员在 Microsoft Teams 中发现了一个新漏洞。该漏洞可能被利用来绕过传统的安全保护（例如针对网络钓鱼或恶意软件），将恶意文件推送到 Microsoft Teams 用户的设备。

Microsoft Teams 在其默认配置中允许来自外部租户的通信请求。 Microsoft Teams 区分内部用户和外部用户。来自组织的用户被视为内部用户，而来自组织外部的用户被视为外部用户。默认情况下，外部用户可以通过 Teams 联系内部用户，但 Microsoft 实施了保护措施来防止攻击。

例如，无法将文件从外部帐户发送到内部帐户。但是，如果请求来自外部源，则可能会发送消息，并且 Microsoft Teams 会通知用户。来自外部源的消息可能不包含文件。

Jumpsec 在 Microsoft Teams 中发现了一个漏洞，该漏洞允许外部用户直接向内部用户发送文件。这些文件与消息一起显示，该消息可以是特制的消息，旨在让目标在计算机上打开该文件。

研究人员解释说：“利用传统的 IDOR 技术，在 POST 请求上切换内部和外部收件人 ID，可以直接利用该漏洞 [..]”。

交付的文件托管在 Sharepoint 域上，但目标的收件箱将其显示为文件，而不是链接。当用户激活该文件时，该文件就会被下载。

Jumpsec 指出，该漏洞是“威胁行为者传递有效负载的潜在有利可图的途径”，因为它绕过了反网络钓鱼安全控制。攻击者必须购买域名并在 M365 上注册，但他们不必使用“成熟的域名，具有 Web 服务器、登陆页面、验证码、域名分类和 URL 过滤”。

Microsoft Teams 漏洞的影响

该漏洞影响所有在默认配置下使用 Microsoft Teams 的组织。组织可以通过禁止外部用户向员工发送消息来缓解该问题。

这可以在 Microsoft Teams 管理中心 >; 外部访问下找到。并非所有组织都能够禁用此选项，因为他们可能需要与外部租户进行通信。这些组织可以使用允许列表添加来自这些组织的域，以便阻止来自所有其他域的通信。

当前对外部消息请求的监控受到限制。研究人员检测到一个 URI，可以对其进行监控以检测 Teams 用户何时接受来自外部源的请求：/api/mt/emea/beta/userSettings/acceptlist/manage

Jumpsec 在发布信息之前向 Microsoft 报告了该漏洞。微软证实了其存在，但据 Jumpsec 称，它“没有达到立即提供服务的标准”。

结束语

系统管理员可能希望限制 Microsoft Teams 管理界面中的外部通信选项以缓解该漏洞。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 发现 Microsoft Teams 漏洞可绕过文件发送限制的帖子首先出现在gHacks Technology News上。

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/microsoft-teams-vulnerability-discovered-to-bypass-file-sending-restrictions/feed/ 1 您的 GTA 5 是否卡在加载屏幕上？这是修复方法！ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-fix-gta-5-stuck-at-loading-screen/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-fix-gta-5-stuck-at-loading-screen/#respondEmre Çitak Mon, 26 Jun 2023 10:00:50 +0000Games https://www.ghacks.net/?p=197832

对于游戏玩家来说，最令人沮丧的体验之一就是卡在加载屏幕上。这种现象在 GTA 5 中尤其臭名昭著，这款游戏以其漫长的加载时间而闻名，尤其是 [...]

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。帖子你的 GTA 5 卡在加载屏幕了吗？这是修复方法！首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

对于游戏玩家来说，最令人沮丧的体验之一就是卡在加载屏幕上。这种现象在 GTA 5 中尤其臭名昭著，这款游戏以其漫长的加载时间而闻名，尤其是在启动游戏或尝试玩 GTA Online 时。浪费时间等待游戏加载可能会非常令人沮丧，尤其是在下班休息之后。

然而，在您绝望地急于删除游戏之前，重要的是要了解问题通常在于玩家端并且可以轻松解决。让我们探索一系列简单而有效的解决方案，帮助您克服可怕的 GTA 5 加载屏幕故障。

如何修复 GTA 5 卡在加载屏幕错误？

如果您发现自己卡在 GTA 5 的加载屏幕上，请不要惊慌。有多种潜在的解决方案可用，但确定您需要的具体解决方案可能有点困难。

在以下部分中，我们将引导您完成各种故障排除步骤，以帮助解决问题并让您重新进入游戏。那么，让我们一一深入探讨这些解决方案。

重新启动并重试

“关闭并重新打开”的古老智慧不仅适用于游戏，也适用于其他技术相关问题。对于非技术人员和经验丰富的 IT 专家来说，建议重新启动游戏或 PC 本身作为解决许多问题的第一步是一种常见的本能。

就 GTA 5 而言，这种方法通常可以纠正因游戏文件加载不完整或系统文件无法正常启动而引起的问题。因此，请关闭您的电脑，使其正确启动，然后重新启动游戏。

如果加载屏幕问题仍然存在，请继续执行下一步。

验证游戏文件

游戏文件损坏或丢失经常会导致加载屏幕问题。但是，您可以轻松验证并解决此问题。

如何在 Steam 上验证 GTA 5 游戏文件

以管理员身份运行 GTA 5 后，请执行以下步骤：

  1. 关闭 GTA 5 并前往您的 Steam 库
  2. 右键单击 GTA 5，然后选择“属性”
  3. 在弹出窗口中，选择第二个选项“验证游戏文件的完整性”

此过程可能需要几分钟时间，因为它会检查并下载任何损坏的文件。好吧，至少新的Steam界面看起来很漂亮，而且不会像以前那么无聊。

如何在 Epic Games 上验证 GTA 5 游戏文件

如果您在 Epic Games 上玩 GTA 5，步骤非常相似：

  1. 关闭 GTA 5 并打开 Epic Games 库
  2. 找到 GTA 5 游戏下方的三个点
  3. 单击“验证”以检查所有游戏文件是否有任何丢失或损坏的情况

这个过程可能需要一段时间。完成此步骤后，您的游戏应该可以正常运行，并且加载屏幕问题可能会得到解决。但是，如果您仍然遇到困难，请不要担心，我们还有更多步骤可供探索。

检查您的互联网连接

网络连接不佳会阻碍游戏连接 Rockstar 服务器的能力，导致无休止的加载屏幕。为确保游戏顺利启动，请尝试关闭路由器，等待 15 秒，然后重新启动。

将电脑重新连接到互联网后，再次启动 GTA 5，看看问题是否仍然存在。如果问题仍然存在，请继续执行下一步。

更新您的显卡驱动程序

保持显卡驱动程序最新对于流畅的游戏体验至关重要，因为它有助于防止崩溃和故障。根据您的显卡制造商的不同，您需要使用适当的软件来检查更新。

如何更新 Nvidia 卡驱动程序

下载并安装 Nvidia GeForce Experience。打开软件并导航至“驱动程序”选项卡。单击“检查更新”，Nvidia 将自动搜索任何驱动程序更新。

下载任何可用的更新并重新启动电脑以应用它们。

通过此处的链接获取 Nvidia GeForce Experience 。

如何更新 AMD 卡驱动程序

下载并安装 AMD 软件肾上腺素版。打开软件并在主页上检查更新。

如果有新的驱动程序版本可用，请单击“下载”，完成后重新启动电脑以应用更新。

您可以使用此处的链接安装 AMD Software Adrenalin Edition 。

如何更新英特尔卡驱动程序

在 Windows 搜索栏中搜索“设备管理器”并将其打开。在“显示适配器”下，找到您的英特尔高清显卡。右键单击它，选择“更新驱动程序”，然后选择“自动选择驱动程序”选项。

重新启动您的电脑以应用所有更新。

更新显卡驱动程序可以增强您的游戏体验，并有可能解决 GTA 5 加载屏幕问题。

重新安装 GTA 5

如果所有其他方法均失败，您可能需要在 PC 上卸载并重新安装 GTA 5。考虑到游戏的文件大小约为 100GB，这一步骤可能会令人望而生畏。

但是，如果以前的解决方案不起作用，那么可能值得付出努力。卸载游戏之前，请确保备份所有重要的游戏保存或文件。

重新安装 GTA 5：

  1. 通过 Steam 或 Epic Games 从 PC 卸载游戏，具体取决于您的平台
  2. 从相应平台重新下载游戏
  3. 按照安装说明进行操作并让游戏完全安装

重新安装游戏通常可以解决顽固问题，包括加载屏幕故障。然而，值得注意的是，这应该被视为最后的手段。

通过执行这些步骤，您应该能够解决 GTA 5 中恼人的加载屏幕故障问题。

请记住，并非所有解决方案都适合所有人，因此请按照所示顺序进行尝试，直到找到适合您的解决方案。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。帖子你的 GTA 5 卡在加载屏幕了吗？这是修复方法！首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-fix-gta-5-stuck-at-loading-screen/feed/ 0 如何在 Instagram 下载 Reel 音频https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-download-reel-audio/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-download-reel-audio/#respondEmre Çitak Mon, 26 Jun 2023 08:45:02 +0000 AppsTutorials https://www.ghacks.net/?p=197581

Instagram Reels 已成为数百万用户喜爱的功能，提供了一个展示创造力和与观众互动的平台。当您滚动浏览“卷轴”部分时，您可能会遇到 [...]

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 如何在 Instagram 上下载 Reel 音频的帖子首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

Instagram Reels 已成为数百万用户喜爱的功能，提供了一个展示创造力和与观众互动的平台。当您滚动浏览“Reels”部分时，您可能会遇到想要在自己的创作中使用的迷人音频。

在这份综合指南中，我们将探讨如何在 2023 年下载 Reel 音频。因此，让我们深入了解如何通过令人兴奋的音轨来增强您的 Reel！

如何下载 Reel 音频

Instagram Reels 席卷了社交媒体世界，为有影响力的人和企业提供了一个完美的渠道来推广他们的产品和服务。使用 Reels，您可以创建 15 到 90 秒的短视频，使其成为吸引注意力和吸引观众的理想工具。

通过整合流行的 Reel 音频，您可以为您的内容添加额外的创造力和相关性。

要直接从 Instagram 下载 Reel 音频，请按照以下简单步骤操作：

  1. 打开 Instagram 应用程序并播放所需的 Reel
  2. 点击位于卷轴底部的音频标题
  3. 单击屏幕右上角的“保存”图标

现在，您可以在个人资料的汉堡菜单中访问收藏中保存的音频，并将其合并到您的卷中。

还有各种第三方工具可用于下载 Reel 音频。以下是如何使用第三方网站下载 Reel 音频

  1. 选择您要下载的 Reel 音频
  2. 点击卷轴右下角的共享图标
  3. 选择复制链接选项
  4. 从下面的链接打开可靠的 Instagram Reel 音频下载工具
    • Insta视频保存
    • 卷轴下载器
    • 卷轴保护器
  5. 将复制的链接粘贴到提供的字段中
  6. 单击下载选项将 Reel 音频保存到您的设备

通过这些简单的方法，为您的 Instagram 创作下载 Reel 音频变得轻而易举。

无论您喜欢使用 Instagram 原生功能还是探索第三方工具，您都可以通过合并朗朗上口的音轨来增强您的 Reels。

享受无限的可能性并创建与您的受众产生共鸣的迷人内容。因此，继续下载 Reel 音频，让您的 Instagram Reel 更具吸引力和令人难忘！

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 如何在 Instagram 上下载 Reel 音频的帖子首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-download-reel-audio/feed/ 0 Mozilla 即将推出数据删除服务 Firefox Monitor Premium https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/firefox-monitor-premium-remove-personal-information-from-the-internet/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/firefox-monitor-premium-remove-personal-information-from-the-internet/#commentsMartin Brinkmann Mon, 26 Jun 2023 08:34:25 +0000Firefox https://www.ghacks.net/?p=198058

Mozilla 计划很快在美国推出 Firefox Monitor Premium，这是一项从互联网上删除个人信息的商业服务。 Firefox Monitor Premium 是 Firefox Monitor 的扩展，是 [...]

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 Mozilla 将推出数据删除服务 Firefox Monitor Premium 的帖子很快首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

Mozilla 计划很快在美国推出 Firefox Monitor Premium，这是一项从互联网上删除个人信息的商业服务。

Firefox Monitor Premium 是Firefox Monitor的扩展，后者是一项免费服务，可以通知用户的电子邮件地址是否受到数据泄露的影响。 Firefox Monitor 检查是否在公开的数据泄露中发现了用户的电子邮件地址。

有关数据删除选项的信息于 2021 年底出现在互联网上。当时用户可以加入候补名单，以受邀测试新的数据删除功能。

与此同时，Mozilla 还在开发 Firefox Monitor。它于四月份以新设计重新推出了该服务。

Firefox Monitor Premium 使用Onerep的 API 来支持其数据搜索和删除操作。 Onerep 是一项仅在美国运营的商业服务。它允许订阅者监控 190 多个不同的数据代理，包括多个搜索引擎，以获取其信息记录。

可以使用该服务向这些经纪人提交删除请求。 Onerep 的另一个关键功能是监控。这是一份月度报告，重点介绍删除请求、统计数据以及与服务运营相关的其他信息。

Firefox Premium Monitor 的工作原理类似。该服务的订阅者需要将他们的信息添加到其中，因为它用于扫描网络以获取数据。 Mozilla 披露了出售该信息的网站数量。

该服务还将揭示信用卡号、社会保障 ID、电子邮件地址或密码是否被发现泄露或暴露。

Mozilla 尚未透露该服务的推出日期。 Sören Hentzschel在他的博客上发布了这些模型，标价为每月 4.99 美元或每年 50 美元。这些可能会发生变化，因为价格比 Onerep 在其网站上收取的价格便宜。

Firefox Monitor 免费版用户可以使用高级服务的扫描一次来查找数据泄露情况。他们无法使用数据删除服务的自动删除请求功能，但可以使用该信息请求从代理站点手动删除其数据。

结束语

Firefox Monitor Premium 扩展了 Mozilla 的商业 Web 服务组合。 Mozilla VPN于 2020 年在部分国家正式推出。还有Firefox Relay ，它通过转发来保护电子邮件地址。

这些服务帮助 Mozilla 实现收入多元化，并减少对搜索引擎交易收入的依赖。 Mozilla 365 订阅服务的推出可能只是时间问题，让订阅者可以访问所有这些服务。

Firefox Monitor 官方网站尚未提供有关该服务的高级版本的信息。目前尚不清楚是否会在其他国家和地区推出。

现在您：您使用 Mozilla 的任何服务吗？

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 Mozilla 将推出数据删除服务 Firefox Monitor Premium 的帖子很快首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/firefox-monitor-premium-remove-personal-information-from-the-internet/feed/ 7 据报道，苹果正在开发多款 Mac 机型https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/apple-is-reportedly-working-on-several-mac-models/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/apple-is-reportedly-working-on-several-mac-models/#commentsAshwin Mon, 26 Jun 2023 07:29:35 +0000Apple https://www.ghacks.net/?p=198054

苹果本月初发布了 15 英寸 MacBook Air M2 和 Mac Pro M2 Ultra，但 Mark Gurman 报道称，库比蒂诺公司正在开发多款 Mac 机型。这就是我们[...]

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 据报道，苹果正在开发多款 Mac 机型的帖子首先出现在gHacks Technology News上。

;

苹果本月初发布了15 英寸 MacBook Air M2和Mac Pro M2 Ultra ，但 Mark Gurman 报道称，库比蒂诺公司正在开发多款 Mac 机型。以下是我们对即将推出的设备的了解。

苹果明年可能会推出多款 MacBook

紧凑型笔记本电脑的粉丝可能会很高兴听到 Apple 正在准备 M3 13 英寸 MacBook Pro。该设备的代号为 J504，随后将推出 Apple M3 Pro 和 M3 Max 14 英寸笔记本电脑。 Gurman 表示，该公司的计划中还包括 16 英寸 MacBook Pro（代号 J514 和 J516）。 M2 MacBook Pro 型号并不令人印象深刻，尽管您可以将此归咎于笔记本电脑的高价标签，尤其是基本版本。

更实惠、更受欢迎的 MacBook Air 系列也将推出一些新笔记本电脑。它们的代号为 J613 和 J615，但目前尚不清楚这两个版本的笔记本电脑之间除了更高的统一内存、存储和 CPU/GPU 内核之外还有什么区别。

iMac 系列早就该更新了，Gurman 声称苹果希望坚持当前型号的 24 英寸屏幕尺寸。鉴于这些是工作站，将更快、更高效的处理器放在同一个封装中是有意义的。这不是我们第一次听到有关新款 iMac 的消息，有关这些新 iMac 的报道已经存在了几个月，预计它们将在 WWDC 2023 上亮相，但并没有成功。新款 iMac 的代号为 J433 和 J434，其中一款很可能是 iMac Pro，可能配备比基本版本更好的处理器和更强大的显卡。据报道，苹果公司还在测试一款显示屏尺寸超过 30 英寸的 iMac。这将使屏幕比具有 27 英寸面板的 Apple Studio Display 更大，这确实让人想知道与现有的独立显示器相比它可能提供什么。

新iPad

苹果并没有忘记它的平板电脑阵容，我们可能还会看到第一款配备 OLED 屏幕的 iPad。下一代 iPad Pro 系列将配备新面板。它将由代号为 J717 和 J720 的两种型号组成。该公司计划用代号为 J507 的新版本取代当前由 M1 驱动的 iPad Air。

Gurman 表示，新款 Mac 和 iPad 可能会在 2024 年上半年发布。对于苹果来说，间隔发布时间以从订单中获利是有意义的，特别是考虑到新款 15 英寸 MacBook Air 一直受到好评来自用户。它可能是商店推荐的 15 英寸笔记本电脑。彭博社记者表示，苹果已经在设计下一代混合现实耳机Vision Pro ，不过第二代型号不太可能在 2025 年之前发布。

Apple Watch Ultra 将于今年推出

Apple Watch Series 9 将于今年亮相，Gurman 表示，新型号分别代号为 N207 和 N208。我们还可以期待新版本的 Apple Watch Ultra，这款高端可穿戴设备的代号为 N210。下一代 Apple Watch 系列可能会与iPhone 15系列一起于 2023 年秋季发布。不要忘记了解iOS 17和macOS 14 Sonoma中的新功能。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 据报道，苹果正在开发多款 Mac 机型的帖子首先出现在gHacks Technology News上。

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/apple-is-reportedly-working-on-several-mac-models/feed/ 2 如何在 YouTube 上上传 Shorts 短片：指南https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-upload-shorts-on-youtube-guide/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-upload-shorts-on-youtube-guide/#respondOnur Demirkol Mon, 26 Jun 2023 07:00:25 +0000 TutorialsYoutube https://www.ghacks.net/?p=197248

借助新的 YouTube Shorts 工具，您现在可以制作短片并将其分发给观众。 YouTube 应用中的 Shorts 相机让创建变得简单 [...]

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 如何在 YouTube 上上传 Shorts：指南一文首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

借助新的 YouTube Shorts 工具，您现在可以制作短片并将其分发给观众。 YouTube 应用中的 Shorts 相机可以轻松制作称为 Shorts 的垂直影片，最长可达 60 秒。如果您不知道如何在 YouTube 上上传 Shorts 短视频，请继续阅读指南。 Today, we will show you how to do it easily!

The platform's short-form video offering, YouTube Shorts, has become extremely popular. After its release, many creators started shooting videos that last up to 60 seconds because that is pretty much how Instagram and TikTok shaped the life of social media. People are now showing interest in fastly consumed content, and if you want to benefit from people's actions on YouTube, keep reading our how to upload Shorts on YouTube guide!

How to upload Shorts on YouTube: PC

Now, it is time to show you how to upload Shorts on YouTube. Today we will concentrate on uploading Shorts on your PC, as it is the most used gadget to edit or publish videos on YouTube.

Step 1: Log into YouTube Studio

You must sign in to YouTube Studio, the control panel where you may manage your channel and videos, in order to post a Short from your computer. By visiting YouTube Studio in any web browser, you may access YouTube Studio.

Step 2: Click CREATE Upload videos

Once in YouTube Studio, a CREATE button will be visible in the top-right area. Select Upload Videos from the drop-down menu after clicking it. You may then choose the video file you wish to upload in the new window that will appear.

Step 3: Select a short video file

You must choose a video file that complies with the following requirements in order to post a Short:

It lasts for up to 60 seconds.
It features a vertical or square aspect ratio (such as 9:16 or 1:1).
It does not include any copyrighted content that you are not allowed to use.

Up to 15 short movies can be selected at once, but be careful to edit each one before releasing.

Step 4: Fill in the required boxes

Fill in the required blank spaces related to your YouTube Shorts video. Its details, elements, checks, visibility, and all that. After you are done editing the blank spaces, hit publish to send it live. Please double-check everything to make sure it goes live without any mistakes, and everything works.

Shorts on YouTube may be easily uploaded, allowing you to share your original work with a huge audience. You may successfully upload and advertise your Shorts films by following these instructions, establishing a presence within the YouTube Shorts community. As you share your short-form films with the world, embrace your creativity, interact with viewers, and have fun.

Thank you for being a Ghacks reader. The post How to upload Shorts on YouTube: Guide appeared first on gHacks Technology News .

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/26/how-to-upload-shorts-on-youtube-guide/feed/ 0 Some LastPass users are locked out of their accounts after trying to reset their authenticator app https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/some-lastpass-users-are-locked-out-of-their-accounts-after-trying-to-reset-their-authenticator-app/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/some-lastpass-users-are-locked-out-of-their-accounts-after-trying-to-reset-their-authenticator-app/#commentsMartin Brinkmann Sun, 25 Jun 2023 13:36:48 +0000Security https://www.ghacks.net/?p=198049

Password management service LastPass started to prompt its customers to reset their two-factor authentication method on May 9th, 2023. The company upgraded account security at the time by raising the number of […]

Thank you for being a Ghacks reader. The post Some LastPass users are locked out of their accounts after trying to reset their authenticator app appeared first on gHacks Technology News .

;

Password management service LastPass started to prompt its customers to reset their two-factor authentication method on May 9th, 2023. The company upgraded account security at the time by raising the number of password iterations to 600,000 rounds.

The increased number of iterations improves the protection of customer's master password, effectively making it more difficult for attackers to discover the correct master password.

LastPass explains on a support page that it uses the "PBKDF2 function implemented with SHA-256 to turn the master password of its customers into the encryption key. The number of rounds are used to create the encryption key and another round ofPBKDF2 is done to create the login hash. This login hash is then submitted to LastPass and used to authenticate the customer.

The new default number of password iterations has been set to 600,000 for new accounts and for accounts that update the existing iteration count.

LastPass informed customers about the upcoming change in emails, but has since then also prompted users to reset their multifactor authentication preferences in the used applications.

At least some LastPass customers have found themselves in reset loops that they can't escape from. In the past couple of days, several LastPass customers posted on the official forum claiming that they can't open their vaults anymore after following the company's instructions to reset their multifactor authentication.

Users of LastPass who face the loop can't open official support tickets, as these can only be opened by signed-in users. Affected users posted messages on Twitter or the LastPass Support Discussions forum .

The majority of recent posts on the official support forum are about login issues after following reset instructions.

LastPass explains the entire resetting process on a support page. There, the company reveals important information about the process. LastPass customers need to log-in to the LastPass website in a web browser to reset the multifactor authentication security feature. Resetting does not work using the browser extensions or the LastPass mobile apps.

The following steps are required to reset the authentication method:

  1. Activate the Continue button after logging in to LastPass. LastPass sends a six digit security code to the linked email address.
  2. The code needs to be entered as part of the process. Select Verify to continue.
  3. Open the authenticator application on the mobile device.
  4. Scan the QR code displayed in the browser using the application to pair it. It may be necessary to select Replace or Remove to delete the old information.
  5. Click Verify.
  6. Log-in to LastPass and authenticate with the multifactor authentication app.

What LastPass fails to mention is that it is sending out a second email that asks users to verify their device and location. Customers need to follow the link in that email to verify the device and location. Failure to do so appears to prevent the successful login.

LastPass experienced a severe security breach in 2022 that led to the copying of user vault data and information by the attacker. LastPass customers were asked to change all their passwords , including their account master password.

The security upgrade improves security for all users and will make it difficult for attackers to decrypt stolen data. Some LastPass users switched to different password managers as a consequence.

Now You : do you use multifactor authentication? (via Bleeping Computer )

Thank you for being a Ghacks reader. The post Some LastPass users are locked out of their accounts after trying to reset their authenticator app appeared first on gHacks Technology News .

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/some-lastpass-users-are-locked-out-of-their-accounts-after-trying-to-reset-their-authenticator-app/feed/ 6 How to factory reset iPhone: Step by step guide https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/how-to-factory-reset-iphone-step-by-step-guide/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/how-to-factory-reset-iphone-step-by-step-guide/#respondEray Eliaçik Sun, 25 Jun 2023 09:00:13 +0000 AppleTutorials https://www.ghacks.net/?p=198025

If you're having software problems, want to sell your iPhone, or just want to start fresh, a factory reset is a great option to have at your disposal. This article will provide […]

Thank you for being a Ghacks reader. The post How to factory reset iPhone: Step by step guide appeared first on gHacks Technology News .

;

If you're having software problems, want to sell your iPhone, or just want to start fresh, a factory reset is a great option to have at your disposal. This article will provide you with all the knowledge you need to successfully conduct a factory reset on your iPhone by walking you through the procedure step by step.

A factory reset is a process that erases all of the data and settings on your iPhone, returning it to the state it was in when you first bought it.

How to factory reset iPhone

Performing a factory reset on your iPhone can be a powerful troubleshooting technique or a necessary step before selling your device. By following these steps, you can confidently erase all content and settings, ensuring your iPhone is ready for a fresh start.

Step 1: Backup your data

Before initiating a factory reset, it's crucial to back up your iPhone to ensure you don't lose any important data. There are two primary methods for backing up your iPhone: using iCloud or iTunes.

  • iCloud Backup:
  1. Connect your iPhone to a Wi-Fi network.
  2. Go to "Settings" and tap on your Apple ID.
  3. Select "iCloud" and then "iCloud Backup."
  4. Toggle on the "iCloud Backup" option and tap on "Back Up Now."
  5. Wait for the backup process to complete. You can verify the backup by going to "Settings," tapping on your Apple ID, and selecting "iCloud" followed by "iCloud Storage" and then "Manage Storage."
  • iTunes Backup:
  1. Connect your iPhone to your computer using a USB cable and launch iTunes.
  2. Select your iPhone icon when it appears in iTunes.
  3. Under the "Backups" section, choose "This Computer" and click on "Back Up Now."
  4. Wait for the backup process to finish. You can verify the backup by going to iTunes Preferences, selecting "Devices," and checking for the latest backup entry.

Step 2: Disable Find My iPhone

To perform a factory reset, you must disable the "Find My iPhone" feature. Here's how to do it:

  1. Open the "Settings" app on your iPhone.
  2. Tap on your Apple ID at the top of the screen.
  3. Select "Find My."
  4. Tap on "Find My iPhone" to toggle it off.
  5. Enter your Apple ID password when prompted.

Step 3: Erase all content and settings

Now that your data is backed up and Find My iPhone is disabled, you can proceed with the factory reset:

  1. Open the "Settings" app on your iPhone.
  2. Scroll down and tap on "General."
  3. Scroll to the bottom and select "Transfer or Reset iPhone."
  4. Choose "Erase All Content and Settings."
  5. If prompted, enter your passcode and restrictions passcode.
  6. Read the warning message thoroughly, and if you're certain, tap on " Erase iPhone."
  7. Enter your Apple ID password to confirm the reset.

Step 4: Wait for the reset

The reset process may take a few minutes to complete. Your iPhone will display the Apple logo with a progress bar. Avoid interrupting the process or turning off your device.

Step 5: Set up your iPhone

After the reset, your iPhone will restart as if it were brand new. Follow the on-screen prompts to set up your device. You can restore your data either from an iCloud backup or from iTunes during this setup process.

Why do you need an iPhone factory reset

Here are the comment reasons for an iPhone factory reset:

  • Resolving software issues: Over time, iPhones can accumulate various software issues that impact performance and stability. These issues may include app crashes, freezing, slow responsiveness, or unexplained glitches. By performing a factory reset, you can effectively wipe away any problematic software and start fresh with a clean operating system. This can help eliminate recurring issues and provide a smoother, more reliable user experience.
  • Preparing your iPhone for sale: If you're planning to sell your iPhone, performing a factory reset is not only recommended but essential. Because it protects your personal information, maintains the device's value, facilitate the setup process for the new owner, and meets some of the online marketplaces' requirements.
  • Enhancing privacy and security: When you decide to sell or give away your iPhone, ensuring your personal data is securely wiped from the device becomes paramount. A factory reset erases all content and settings, making it nearly impossible for anyone to retrieve your personal information. This is especially crucial considering the amount of sensitive data we store on our smartphones, including personal messages, photos, passwords, and financial information. By performing a factory reset, you protect your privacy and reduce the risk of identity theft or unauthorized access to your data.
  • Starting fresh: Sometimes, we simply want to start anew with our iPhones. Over time, apps, settings, and accumulated data can clutter our devices and impact performance. A factory reset provides a clean slate, allowing you to set up your iPhone from scratch, reinstalling only the apps and settings you truly need. This can lead to improved performance, increased storage space, and a more streamlined user experience.
  • Troubleshooting complex issues: If you encounter persistent and unresolvable issues on your iPhone, such as frequent crashes, unresponsive touch screen, or severe battery drain, a factory reset can serve as a last-resort troubleshooting step. By wiping the device and starting afresh, you eliminate the possibility of software conflicts or corrupt files that may be causing the problem. It helps you isolate whether the issue is software-related or hardware-related, providing valuable information if you need to seek professional assistance or warranty support.

Thank you for being a Ghacks reader. The post How to factory reset iPhone: Step by step guide appeared first on gHacks Technology News .

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/how-to-factory-reset-iphone-step-by-step-guide/feed/ 0 iPhone voicemail not working: How to fix it https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/iphone-voicemail-not-working-how-to-fix-it/ https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/iphone-voicemail-not-working-how-to-fix-it/#respondEray Eliaçik Sun, 25 Jun 2023 07:00:34 +0000 AppleTutorials https://www.ghacks.net/?p=198032

Voicemail is an essential feature on any smartphone, allowing users to receive and store voice messages when they can't answer a call. However, like any technology, voicemail on iPhones can sometimes encounter […]

Thank you for being a Ghacks reader. The post iPhone voicemail not working: How to fix it appeared first on gHacks Technology News .

;

Voicemail is an essential feature on any smartphone, allowing users to receive and store voice messages when they can't answer a call. However, like any technology, voicemail on iPhones can sometimes encounter problems.

If you're experiencing issues with your iPhone voicemail, fear not! In this troubleshooting guide, we'll walk you through some common problems and provide expert tips to get your voicemail up and running smoothly again.

How to fix iPhone voicemail not working

Your iPhone's voicemail is a valuable tool for staying connected with people who call you when you can't answer. But what happens when your voicemail stops working? Check out these solutions to fix it:

  • Check your network connection : Before diving into more advanced troubleshooting steps, it's important to ensure that your iPhone has a stable network connection. Poor or no network coverage can lead to voicemail-related problems. Try the following steps:
    • Verify that your device is connected to a Wi-Fi network or has a strong cellular signal.
    • Disable and re-enable Airplane Mode to reset your network connections.
    • If possible, test your voicemail while connected to a different Wi-Fi network or cellular network to rule out any network-related issues.
  • Update carrier settings and iOS : Outdated carrier settings or iOS software can sometimes cause conflicts with voicemail functionality. To ensure your iPhone is running the latest software versions:
    • Go to "Settings" on your iPhone.
    • Select "General" and then "About."
    • If an update is available, follow the prompts to install it.
    • Similarly, under "Settings," select "General" and then "Carrier" to check for any carrier settings updates.
  • Reset voicemail settings : Resetting your voicemail settings can often resolve minor glitches or configuration issues. Follow these steps to reset your iPhone voicemail:
    • Open the Phone app on your iPhone.
    • Tap on the "Voicemail" tab at the bottom right corner.
    • Locate and tap on "Greeting" or "Customize" to access voicemail settings.
    • Choose the option to reset your voicemail password or reset your voicemail settings entirely.
    • Restart your iPhone after the reset and test your voicemail functionality again.
  • Contact your carrier : If the above steps haven't resolved your voicemail issues, it's time to get in touch with your carrier's customer support. They can assist you in diagnosing and resolving network-specific problems related to voicemail. Remember to provide them with detailed information about the issue, the steps you've already taken, and any error messages you've encountered.
  • Reset network settings : Resetting your network settings can help fix underlying network configuration issues that may be affecting voicemail. However, note that this will remove saved Wi-Fi passwords and VPN configurations. To reset network settings:
    • Navigate to "Settings" on your iPhone.
    • Select "General" and then "Reset."
    • Tap on "Reset Network Settings" and enter your passcode if prompted.
    • Confirm the reset and wait for your iPhone to restart.
  • Seek professional help : If none of the above solutions have resolved your voicemail issues, it's recommended to seek assistance from an Apple Genius Bar, authorized service provider, or Apple Support online. They possess the expertise and tools to diagnose and fix complex hardware or software problems that may be causing voicemail malfunction.

Voicemail problems on your iPhone can be frustrating, but with the right troubleshooting steps, you can often resolve them on your own. Start by checking your network connection and updating your carrier settings and iOS. Resetting voicemail settings or network settings may also help. If all else fails, reach out to your carrier's customer support or seek professional assistance.

Keep in mind that, like with most things in life, persistence, and patience are necessary for restoring full functionality to your iPhone voicemail.

Thank you for being a Ghacks reader. The post iPhone voicemail not working: How to fix it appeared first on gHacks Technology News .

; https://www.ghacks.net/2023/06/25/iphone-voicemail-not-working-how-to-fix-it/feed/ 0
